name: Slime Bouncer
description:
Protagonist | Plot Armor Studios on Discord

Full Screen SIZE ;) is recommended by NOT necessary!

Controls:

A and D for Left and Right movement

Space, W, or Right Click to Jump

S or Left Click to Dive
